subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jhonny Peralta hit an inside-the-park home run after Ryan Raburn crashed through a bullpen door, helping the Indians to a 7-2 victory over the Tigers.
snippet: Jhonny Peralta hit an inside-the-park home run after Ryan Raburn crashed through a bullpen door, helping the Indians to a 7-2 victory over the Tigers.
